function.name: get_past_negotiations
function.description: Retrieves historical negotiation data for this venue from past interactions. Returns details including event budgets and sizes, initial quotes with breakdowns, counteroffers made, and final agreed prices. Use this data to understand the venue's pricing patterns and negotiation flexibility when their current quote exceeds your client's budget.

venue_id.description: The ID of the venue being negotiated with

function.name: web_search
function.description: Search the web for any information you need. Use this tool whenever you need to look up information, verify details, research venues, or answer questions you don't have immediate knowledge about. Call this proactively when you encounter gaps in your information.

query.description: The query to search the web for
